Address.label: Address
Address.value: 300 FRANK W. BURR BOULEVARD,SUITE 36, 6TH FLOOR, TEANECK, New Jersey, 07666, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Cognizant is a global IT services provider, offering consulting and outsourcing services to some of the world's largest enterprises spanning the financial services, media and communications, healthcare, natural resources, and consumer products industries. Cognizant employs nearly 300,000 people globally, roughly 70% of whom are in India, although the company's headquarters are in Teaneck, New Jersey.
